query: mutation createMaterialStockSite($command: CreateMaterialStockSiteCommandInput!) { createMaterialStockSite(command: $command) { ...materialStockSite __typename } } fragment materialStockSite on MaterialStockSite { material { reference __typename } stockSite { ...stockSite __typename } productionMethod __typename } fragment stockSite on StockSite { reference name addressLine1 addressLine2 addressLine3 postcode city countryCode createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename }
